header.note: The character "%" (out of a numerical context) is a meta-character that will be replaced (often by a numeric value) before the string is displayed
Text between less than (<) and greater than (>) symbols is a variable's name and must not be localised

trans-unit.source: Do not show this dialog at startup
trans-unit.target: Do not show this dialog at startup

trans-unit.source: (The “4D Templates” folder is empty or not found next to the application)
trans-unit.target: (The “4D Templates” folder is empty or not found next to the application)

trans-unit.source: The database that you tried to open was not found (database path: {basePath})
trans-unit.target: The database that you tried to open was not found (database path: {basePath})

trans-unit.resname: Warning. Package name and file name don't match
trans-unit.source: The database name that you want to open does not match with the structure name inside the database package. Maybe you renamed the database package that can be the cause of this message. The message will no longer appear when the database is opened subsequently and the opening of the database will now proceed normally. The open structure file will be: "{4dbFile}"
trans-unit.target: The database name that you want to open does not match with the structure name inside the database package. Maybe you renamed the database package that can be the cause of this message. The message will no longer appear when the database is opened subsequently and the opening of the database will now proceed normally. The open structure file will be: "{4dbFile}"

trans-unit.source: No data file was found for the database "{BaseName}". Do you want to open an existing data file or to create a new data file?
trans-unit.target: No data file was found for the database "{BaseName}". Do you want to open an existing data file or to create a new data file?

trans-unit.source: A 4D database needs this file to store its data.
trans-unit.target: A 4D database needs this file to store its data.

trans-unit.source: {PluginName} could not be loaded as a plug-in. It may not support the Intel architecture.
trans-unit.target: {PluginName} could not be loaded as a plug-in. It may not support the Intel architecture.

trans-unit.source: A valid log file was not found. The database will not be opened without a log activated.
trans-unit.target: A valid log file was not found. The database will not be opened without a log activated.

trans-unit.source: The database is damaged, it will be opened in maintenance mode.
trans-unit.target: The database is damaged, it will be opened in maintenance mode.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred during the log file integration, it is recommended to restore the last backup of this database in order to attempt the integration of this log file.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred during the log file integration, it is recommended to restore the last backup of this database in order to attempt the integration of this log file.

trans-unit.source: Do you want to open an existing data file or to create a new data file?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to open an existing data file or to create a new data file?

trans-unit.source: You pressed the "<vKey>" key. You can choose a data file or create a new one. Click on "Cancel" to open the database with the default data file.
trans-unit.target: You pressed the "<vKey>" key. You can choose a data file or create a new one. Click on "Cancel" to open the database with the default data file.

trans-unit.source:
You pressed the "{AltKeyName}" key.
Select the operation you want to do:
trans-unit.target:
You pressed the "{AltKeyName}" key.
Select the operation you want to do:

trans-unit.source: Open the application with the default data file
trans-unit.target: Open the application with the default data file

trans-unit.source: Open the Maintenance and Security Center
trans-unit.target: Open the Maintenance and Security Center

trans-unit.resname: Please select database definition xml file.

trans-unit.source: 4D needs to install a tool in your PrivilegedHelperTools system folder in order to start the Web Server on port [#port]. You must be authenticated as Administrator to install this tool. Do you want to proceed?
trans-unit.target: 4D needs to install a tool in your PrivilegedHelperTools system folder in order to start the Web Server on port [#port]. You must be authenticated as Administrator to install this tool. Do you want to proceed?

group.note: This group has been copied/pasted from the PreferencesEN.xlf file of the version 11 (ACI0064214)

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to open the structure file in read only mode?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to open the structure file in read only mode?

trans-unit.target: Enter username and password for "<vrealm>" at "<vdomain>"
